text: , known professionally as , was a Japanese actress, screenwriter, singer, essayist, and television personality. Her husband was the late television personality Keisuke Sagawa. Nobuyo was best known for voicing the main character in the Doraemon anime series that ran from 1979 to 2005. She also voiced Monokuma, the main villain from the Danganronpa video-game series, from 2010 to 2016 and in Danganronpa: The Animation. In May 2015, it was announced that Nobuyo had dementia and living in a retirement home in Tokyo. She died from the disease on September 29, 2024 at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official agency profile Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:Japanese television personalities Category:Writers from Tokyo Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Singers from Tokyo Category:Essayists
